actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To provide for the establishment of the Office for Access to Justice in the Department of Justice, and for other purposes.
short_title: Office for Access to Justice Establishment Act of 2020

summary.text:
Office for Access to Justice Establishment Act of 2020 

This bill establishes the Office for Access to Justice within the Department of Justice (DOJ) to advise on matters relating to justice for low-income and other people in the criminal and civil justice systems. Additionally, DOJ must establish a Legal Aid Interagency Roundtable to raise the awareness of executive branch agencies of the ways in which civil legal aid and indigent defense can help advance federal objectives, including those related to employment, family stability, housing, consumer protection, health services, and public safety.
